description: This file defines the AppGatewayClient class, which provides an interface for calling the org.rdk.AppGateway.respond method via RPC. It encapsulates the RPC invocation logic, accepting a transport function and a method to respond with a payload using consumer context data.

classes.name: AppGatewayClient
classes.description: A client class that manages RPC calls to the AppGateway, specifically the respond method.

methods.name: constructor(private readonly invokeRpc: (method: string, params: unknown) => Promise<unknown>)/ constructor
methods.description: Initializes the AppGatewayClient with an RPC invoking function.

methods.name: async respond(consumerCtx: ConsumerContext, payload: unknown): Promise<void> { respond
methods.description: Sends a response back to the consumer via the AppGateway, including consumer context and payload.
